nodes.text: The Ando Demilitarization Observation Group was a Galactic Republic organization sent to the planet of Ando due to the constant violence erupting across the world. Master Jorus C'baoth of the Jedi Order served as one of the group's primary observers.

When asked on Twitter if the Observation Group was linked with the Andoan Wars mentioned in The Essential Guide to Warfare, the book's authors Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry answered this was "likely" and "a fair assumption."
